title: Kenya's opposition crackdown deepens
text:
Kenya's opposition crackdown deepens 7:42am EST - 01:52 
New protests erupt in Nairobi as President Uhuru Kenyatta defies a court order to lift a media blackout on three television stations and a prominent opposition lawyer temporarily detained by police.   
New protests erupt in Nairobi as President Uhuru Kenyatta defies a court order to lift a media blackout on three television stations and a prominent opposition lawyer temporarily detained by police.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/02/02/kenyas-opposition-crackdown-deepens?videoId=390393054&videoChannel=13421
